actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public."wp_users" SET
		"user_email" = '{{update_form.fieldState.user_email.isVisible ? update_form.formData.user_email : update_form.sourceData.user_email}}',
		"user_login" = '{{update_form.fieldState.user_login.isVisible ? update_form.formData.user_login : update_form.sourceData.user_login}}',
    "user_nicename" = '{{update_form.fieldState.user_nicename.isVisible ? update_form.formData.user_nicename : update_form.sourceData.user_nicename}}',
		"display_name" = '{{update_form.fieldState.display_name.isVisible ? update_form.formData.display_name : update_form.sourceData.display_name}}'
WHERE "id" = {{data_table.selectedRow.id}};
